data.name: The University of Sheffield
content: Studied advanced topics in Machine Learning and Adaptive Intelligence, Natural Language Processing, and Text Processing.
Refactored a legacy codebase as part of a Software Re-engineering module, reducing code complexity, improving performance, and increasing unit test coverage.
Built AudioEmailr, a voice-driven email client integrating Gmail, Zoho, and Outlook APIs with Google Speech-to-Text and MongoDB, enabling hands-free email management.
Developed Study Buddy, an Alexa skill designed to support students with revision, using AWS Lambda and the Alexa Skills Kit to deliver an interactive, voice-first learning experience.

data.name: Sri Krishna College of Engineering and Technology
data.degree: B.E. in Computer Science and Engineering
content: Won awards at national and international hackathons across multiple disciplines.
Built a strong foundation across core Computer Science areas including Data Structures, Operating Systems, and Database Management Systems.
